00019 CPlayGameGalaxy::CPlayGameGalaxy(CExeFile &ExeFile, char level,
00020    char numplayers, char difficulty,
00021    stOption *p_option, CSavedGame &SavedGame) :
00022 CPlayGame(ExeFile, level, numplayers, difficulty, p_option),
00023 m_WorldMap(ExeFile),
00024 m_LevelPlay(ExeFile),

00031 bool CPlayGameGalaxy::loadGameState()
00032 { return false; }
00033 
00034 // Setup for the ingame
00035 bool CPlayGameGalaxy::init()
00036 {
00037  if(m_Level == 0)
00038  {
00039   m_WorldMap.setActive(true);
00040   return false;
00041  }
00042  else
00043  {
00044   // manually a level has been loaded
00045   m_LevelPlay.loadLevel(m_Level);
00046   m_LevelPlay.setActive(true);
00047   return true;
00048  }
00049 }
00050 
00051 /**
00052  *  The main ingame process cycle when keen galaxy is up and running
00053  */
00054 void CPlayGameGalaxy::process()
00055 {
00056  if(mp_Menu) // In case the menu is open
00057  {
00058   // draw the title bitmap here!
00059   m_BackgroundBitmap.draw(g_pVideoDriver->BlitSurface, 0, 0);
00060 
00061   if(mp_Menu->mustClose())
00062   {
00063    delete mp_Menu;
00064    mp_Menu = NULL;
00065   }
00066   else if(mp_Menu->getExitEvent())
00067    m_exitgame = true;
00068   else if(mp_Menu->mustEndGame())
00069    m_endgame = true;
00070   else
00071    mp_Menu->process();
00072  }
00073  else
00074  {
00075   processInput();
00076 
00077   // process World Map if active. At the start it's enabled
00078   if(m_WorldMap.isActive())
00079   {
00080    m_WorldMap.process();
00081   }
00082 
00083   // process World Map if active. At the start it's enabled
00084   if(m_LevelPlay.isActive())
00085   {
00086    m_LevelPlay.process();
00087   }
00088 
00089   // process Page if one is open. Could be one of the finale scenes
00090   //if(m_Page.isActive())
00091   //m_Page.process();
00092 
00093   processRendering();
00094  }
00095 
00096  // In this part we will poll all the relevant Events that are important for the
00097  // Galaxy Main Engine itself. For example, load map, setup world map, show Highscore
00098  // are some of those events.
00099  CEventContainer& EventContainer = g_pBehaviorEngine->m_EventList;
00100  if( EventEnterLevel* ev = EventContainer.occurredEvent<EventEnterLevel>() )
00101  {
00102   // Start a new level!
00103   if(ev->data > 0xC000)
00104   {
00105    m_WorldMap.setActive(false);
00106    m_LevelPlay.loadLevel(ev->data - 0xC000);
00107    m_LevelPlay.setActive(true);
00108   }
00109   EventContainer.pop_Event();
00110  }
00111  else if( EventContainer.occurredEvent<EventExitLevel>() )
00112  {
00113   m_LevelPlay.setActive(false);
00114   m_WorldMap.setActive(true);
00115  }
00116 
00117 
00118 }
00119 
00120 void CPlayGameGalaxy::processInput()
00121 {
00122  // open the menu
00123  if(g_pInput->getPressedCommand(IC_QUIT))
00124  {
00125   mp_Menu = new CMenuGalaxy(ACTIVE, m_ExeFile, m_SavedGame, mp_option, m_restartVideo);
00126   m_BackgroundBitmap = *g_pGfxEngine->getBitmap("KEENSWATCH");
00127  }
00128 
00129 }

00132  * This processes the rendering over all the other stuff. THis is used for extra messages normally
00133  * blit scrollsurface happens with m_WorldMap or m_LevelPlay
00134  */
00135 void CPlayGameGalaxy::processRendering()
00136 {
00137 
00138 }

00144 CPlayGameGalaxy::~CPlayGameGalaxy()
00145 {

00147   delete mp_Menu;
00148 }
